titleStmt.title: The necessity of parliaments with seasonable directions for the more regular election of parliament-men : to which is added The bill for regulating elections of members to serve in Parliament, as it was read and committed by the House of Commons in the year 1679 ... / by a true Protestant, and English man.
titleStmt.author: True Protestant and English man.
